Html:
Hey guys i am doing a small application I was wondering can anyone help me and let me know how to keep the coverflow rotating.

I want to display a set of images one after the other but i dont want it to show in slideshow i want it to show in cover flow so is it possible to do such a thing and if so how can it be done.

coz i dont want the mouse click on my scroll set a time and keep switching the image automatically.
